A ggplot2 theme for SOE map figures

Source: R/theme_map.R
theme_map.Rd

A ggplot2 theme for SOE map figures

Usage

theme_map(...)

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
library(rnaturalearth); library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr); library(sf)

#Map line parameters
map.lwd <- 0.4

# Set lat/lon window for maps
xmin = -76
xmax = -66
ymin = 36
ymax = 45
xlims <- c(xmin, xmax)
ylims <- c(ymin, ymax)

#Get base map and set CRS
crs <- "+proj=longlat +lat_1=35 +lat_2=45 +lat_0=40 +lon_0=-77 +x_0=0 +y_0=0
+datum=NAD83 +no_defs +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0"
coast <- ne_countries(scale = 10,
                      continent = "North America",
                      returnclass = "sf") %>%
  sf::st_transform(crs = crs)

#Plot with SOE theme
ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = coast) +
  coord_sf(crs = crs, xlim = xlims, ylim = ylims) +
  theme_map()
 } # }
